dt.patient_target:
SELECT
	patient_num       AS    "patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.gender_target:
SELECT
    patient_num       AS    "patient_identifier_value",
    sex_cd            AS    "patient_gender"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.zipcode_target:
SELECT
    patient_num       AS    "patient_identifier_value",
    zip_cd            AS    "patient_address_postalCode"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.birthdate_target:
SELECT
    patient_num       AS    "patient_identifier_value",
    birth_date::date  AS    "patient_birthDate"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.encounter_target:
SELECT
	patient_num       AS    "encounter_subject_patient_identifier_value",
  encounter_num     AS    "encounter_identifier_value"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension
ORDER BY
  patient_num;
dt.encounterstart_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.start_date::date    AS    "EpisodeOfCare_period_start"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, start_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension) AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.encounterend_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.end_date::date    AS    "EpisodeOfCare_period_end"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, end_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension) AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.ageindays_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.nval_num    AS    "encounter_subject_patient_age_days"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FALL:AITAA') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.ageinyears_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.nval_num    AS    "encounter_subject_patient_age_years"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FALL:AIJAA') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.admission_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd    AS    "encounter_hospitalization_admitSource"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'AUFNAN%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.hospitalization_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd    AS    "encounter_hospitalization_class"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'AUFNGR%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.discharge_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd    AS    "encounter_hospitalization_dischargeDisposition"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'ENTLGR%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.ventilation_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.nval_num    AS    "procedure_code_coding_code_40617009"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FALL:BEATMST') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.condition_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.visit_occurrence_id    AS    "condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.condition_source_value    AS    "condition_code_coding_code"
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id, condition_source_value
FROM
  p21_cdm.condition_occurrence) AS a ON
  a.visit_occurrence_id = b.visit_occurrence_id
ORDER BY
  b.visit_occurrence_id;
dt.conditioncategory_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.visit_occurrence_id    AS    "condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.condition_type_concept_id    AS    "condition_category_encounter_diagnosis"
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id, condition_type_concept_id
FROM
  p21_cdm.condition_occurrence) AS a ON
  a.visit_occurrence_id = b.visit_occurrence_id
ORDER BY
  b.visit_occurrence_id;
dt.procedure_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.visit_occurrence_id    AS    "procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.procedure_source_value    AS    "procedure_code_coding_code"
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id, procedure_source_value
FROM
  p21_cdm.procedure_occurrence) AS a ON
  a.visit_occurrence_id = b.visit_occurrence_id
ORDER BY
  b.visit_occurrence_id;
dt.proceduredate_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.start_date::date    AS    "procedure_performedDateTime"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, start_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'OPS%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.provider_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.visit_occurrence_id    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.care_site_id    AS    "encounter_serviceProvider_type_Organization_name"
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id, care_site_id
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence) AS a ON
  a.visit_occurrence_id = b.visit_occurrence_id
ORDER BY
  b.visit_occurrence_id;
dt.providerstart_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.start_date::date    AS    "encounter_period_start"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, start_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FACHABT%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.providerend_target:
SELECT
  DISTINCT b.encounter_num    AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  a.end_date::date    AS    "encounter_period_end"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.encounter_mapping AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, end_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FACHABT%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
